TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IidAnomalyDetectionBaseWrapper extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ML.ICanSaveModel, class Microsoft.ML.ITransformer
type IidAnomalyDetectionBaseWrapper = class interface ITransformer interface ICanSaveModel

Docs.summary: The is the wrapper to that computes the p-values and martingale scores for a supposedly i.i.d input sequence of floats. In other words, it assumes the input sequence represents the raw anomaly score which might have been computed via another process.

Docs.summary: Constructs a row-to-row mapper based on an input schema. If is false, then an exception should be thrown. If the input schema is in any way unsuitable for constructing the mapper, an exception should likewise be thrown.

Docs.summary: Take the data in, make transformations, output the data. Note that 's are lazy, so no actual transformations happen here, just schema validation.
